reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute and appreciate that the color is spot on. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some finding it nice while others describe it as cheap. The fit, size, and weight also get mixed reviews, with several customers noting it runs small and has a T-shirt weight. The material thickness is criticized for being incredibly thin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Obsessed with this Top!
items.body: I'm usually not a crop top person, but this one totally changed my mind! It's the perfect length - hits right at the waist so it's flattering and on-trend without showing too much. The color is gorgeous and goes with everything. Plus, the quality is amazing! I've washed it a few times and it still looks brand new. If you're hesitant about crop tops, trust me, this one is a winner! Read more
items.author: April F

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute top!
items.body: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She is 14. It fits her really well and looks super cute. The material is nice and soft. It is true to size. Read more
items.author: Charlene Kress

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easily goes with everything
items.body: This is a nice top. Fits true to size, a little baggy. Easily tucked in if you need. It is light and very stylish. Read more
items.author: Jgreenn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Enjoy!
items.body: This is a nice blouse- I like the fit and the color! Read more
items.author: karen taylor

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Thin cheap material
items.body: I thought it was a longer crop, but it is not. Fabric is cheap and very thin. I was hoping for a thicker weave. The lantern sleeves are not very ballooned at the end. I think I may have been happier if I sized up at least one size, maybe two. Overall, I wouldn’t purchase this. Read more
items.author: Marisa

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars The color is really wrong
items.body: The style is as expected. I'm 4'11 and 135 lbs, I ordered a medium and though the sleeves are of a good length, the torso part is still a little bit short. These two issues are somewhat minor so I would've kept the top if not for two things: the fabric of the beige is somewhat thicker than the green one and the sides kind of fold in an awkward way. It would've been more flattering to fall straight down in a boxy shape for this kind of crop top. I'm ordering a large to give it a try, hopefully it will have a better shape. The major disappointment about this top is that the beige is nowhere near beige. It's not brownish or tannish or whitish. It is a light orange-pink cream color that can and does look like flesh color, or yogurt, not even a nice off-white at all. Maybe it would look nice on very very fair skin but for medium or olive tones, it's really weird. For this reason I'm ordering a green or brown or black. Read more
items.author: Hamster

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful top
items.body: It's exactly as it appears in the picture. I really like it it's cropped it'll come down to the top of your jeans or whatever your bottoms are I'm going to look to see if they have it in Black I bet you it would look gorgeous in Black Read more
items.author: Catherine Jeanette

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars New favorite basic sweater
items.body: I love this sweater! It's comfortable, soft and fits great! It's also a great staple to have in your fall wardrobe. Bought it in 3 colors! Read more
items.author: Teacher Trauma

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 109-beige, 109-black, 109-brown, Light Green, 109-orange. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
